basic.description:
An introduction to key structuralist, poststructuralist, and marxist theories and to those art historians on whose work they have been most influential.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: The 'New Art History':Critical and Cultural Theory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    A GPA of 2.6 in a minium of 24.0 units in ARTH and Level 4 and registration in an ARTH Major or Medial Plan.
